abstract: With issues of privacy one of the burning topics of the day, as companies such as Facebook and AT&T mired in the subject, venture capitalists have seen an investment opportunity and turned their money towards privacy related start ups, The Wall Street Journal reported.
snippet: With issues of privacy one of the burning topics of the day, as companies such as Facebook and AT&T mired in the subject, venture capitalists have seen an investment opportunity and turned their money towards privacy related start ups, The Wall St...
lead_paragraph: With issues of online privacy one of the burning topics of the day, venture capitalists have seen an investment opportunity and turned their money towards privacy related start-ups, The Wall Street Journal reported.

headline.main: Privacy Start-Ups Said to Be Hot in V.C.
